mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fi_engineercharge_master_condition( id, order_id, order_no, service_point_id, payment_type, status, charge_order_type, auto_charge_flag, charge_date, charge_by, order_close_date, insurance_no, customer_time_liness, time_liness, quarter ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderId}, #{orderNo}, #{servicePointId}, #{paymentType}, #{status}, #{chargeOrderType}, #{autoChargeFlag}, #{chargeDate}, #{chargeBy}, #{orderCloseDate}, #{insuranceNo}, #{customerTimeLiness}, #{timeLiness}, #{quarter} )
